home.miniCv: I'm an Argentinean based fullstack developer focused on crafting clean & maintainable code across the full stack of an app. I am passionate about what I do and I love learning all the time about it.

xp.title: Fullstack Software Developer
xp.description: I spent my freelance period developing the full stack of mainly news sites and e-commrce. This was achieved by working with PHP, JS, SCSS, CSS and primarily the Wordpress and Laravel framework depending on the client needs.

xp.title: Fullstack Software Developer
xp.description: Development and mantaining of their Educational Management System. It was a PHP app built with the Laravel framework and the Doctrine ORM. The challenge was to modernize such a gigantic app. My job was mostly PHP/Laravel and a tiny bit of NodeJS and VueJS.

xp.title: Fullstack Software Developer
xp.description: In Softvision I oficially became a NodeJS/Typescript developer. At the moment of writing this I'm in charge of buiding Microservices, providing maintainable and scalable code. All environments are hosted in AWS and the management with JIRA.

education.title: Fullstack Software Developer
education.description: Full stack development course about the whole process of building an app. HTML, Javascript, CSS, SQL, Object oriented programming, agile and SCRUM, some notions of React. The backend side was taught in PHP

education.title: The Object Oriented Paradigm
education.description: A short course about the principal concepts about Object Oriented Programming. Basic concepts, good practices, Usual tecniques. Taught in Java but applicable to all languages

education.title: Bachelor's degree in Music
education.description: Completed university degree in Music with specialisation in Guitar

contact.engagementText: Feel free to get in touch with me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
